contents:
连驻巴西大使杨万明都加入批斗爱德华多的行列了：
https://twitter.com/WanmingYang/status/1240441812105519109
你的言论是对中国和中国人民的恶毒攻击，我们绝不接受。你作为联邦众议员和有特殊身份的公众人物，发表此番反华言论，非常不妥，将给中巴两国友好带来伤害。我对你的推文表示严厉谴责，要求你撤销此条推文，并向中国人民道歉。我将向巴西外交部和众议院表达中方的严重不满和抗议。——官媒翻译

官媒报道依旧没原文，驻巴西大使馆的批斗微博也没写进去：
http://m.news.cctv.com/2020/03/19/ARTIkSNdVAtGEo24oBNQQ2pp200319.shtml
https://twitter.com/EmbaixadaChina/status/1240444169497260034
“[Eduardo] had contracted a mental virus while in the United States. Sadly, you are a person without any international vision or common sense. We suggest you don’t rush to become the U.S. spokesman in Brazil, or risk an ugly fall.”-- Reuters report quoting one of the Chinese embrassy tweets

参考路透社英文报道对爱德华多的微博翻译：
Coronavirus thumps Brazil, prompting nationwide cries of 'Bolsonaro Out!'
In a tweet, he likened China’s role in the coronavirus outbreak to that of the USSR during the Chernobyl nuclear disaster, alleging a cover-up. “It’s China’s fault and freedom is the answer,” he tweeted.
